title: HINDU SAYS SAMPANTHAN’S PARTY STILL RETAINS SEPARATE STATE NOTION IN ITS CONSTITUTION
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana The Ilankai Thamil Arasu Katchi (The tamil name for Sri Lanka Tamil Government Party) has refused to revisit its constitution which seeks the establishment of a separate stateat its 14th National Convention in Batticaloa recently charged the Hindu newspaper….
